titleStmt.title: Pharisaisme and Christianity compared and set forth in a sermon at Pauls Crosse, May 1. 1608. By I.H. Vpon Matth. 5.20.
titleStmt.author: Hall, Joseph, 1574-1656.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Melchisedech Bradwood for Samuel Macham, and are to be sold at his shop in Pauls Church-yard at the signe of the Bul-head,

notesStmt.note: Bound and filmed with STC 12693.7 (formerly STC 12695).
Reproduction of the original in the Library of Congress.
